title: The Harmonic Rescuer: The Tale of David Howard
summary: David Howard, a 38-year-old music consultant, discovers his ability to manipulate sound waves to fight crime over the course of one week.
summaryGerman: David Howard, ein 38-jähriger Musikberater, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche seine Fähigkeit, Schallwellen zu manipulieren, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen.
summaryDutch: David Howard, een 38-jarige muziekconsulent, ontdekt zijn vermogen om geluidsgolven te manipuleren om misdaad te bestrijden gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: David Howard, un consultant musical de 38 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler les ondes sonores pour lutter contre le crime au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: David Howard woke up to a regular day of work at his music studio. While fine-tuning a client's arrangement, he unintentionally shatters a glass using his strange new ability to control sound waves.

Excited about his newfound powers, David experiments more and discovers he can also amplify sounds to create barriers. He prevents a robbery by amplifying the sound of the alarm, scaring the thieves away.
David gets in touch with a local superhero group who are intrigued by his abilities. They invite him to join them on a night patrol.
During patrol, David uses his sound abilities to disorient a gang causing mayhem in the city. The superheroes commend his actions, finding his skills extremely valuable.
David returns to his studio inspired, using his experiences to compose an epic score that echoes his adventures as a superhero.
News of the 'Sound Hero' begins to spread, and he receives messages from people asking for help. David spends the day helping those in need, feeling fulfilled and at peace with his dual life.
Reflecting on his week, David gears up for what lies ahead. He decides to balance his time between music and heroism, dedicating his life to helping others in more ways than one.

ending: Thus, David Howard, the Harmonic Rescuer, found a perfect rhythm between his passion and his purpose.
moral: Embrace your unique gifts, as they might be the key to balancing your dreams and duty in life.
